title: Bacteria and fungi affect energy availability 3

content.question: Based on the scientist’s claim, predict which treatment group will have the smallest amount of accessible nutrients in the soil at the end of the experiment. Justify your prediction in terms of the relative impact of a keystone species in the environment.

frqParts.text: Based on the scientist’s claim, predict which treatment group will have the smallest amount of accessible nutrients in the soil at the end of the experiment. Justify your prediction in terms of the relative impact of a keystone species in the environment.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
